yacl3.config.wikiwriter:title: WikiWriter Config
Settings related to copying individual items.
Settings related to text and lore filters.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.modEnable: Enabled the features of this mod.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.setAmount: Toggle whether or not individually-copied items will have their amounts set to 1
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.disableCl: Disables the ability to click on items in menus that don't have an item ID or name. (Items without a name and any lore already cannot be clicked nor hovered over. This doesn't change that.)
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.menuRefer:
Toggles when copied items in menus should use template references instead (i.e. {{Item/DIAMOND_SWORD|real_lore}}) 

This setting doesn't affect recipes or items without a SkyBlock ID.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.shopMenuM:
Automatically converts copied shop GUIs to use the required shop menu format.

Note: Shop prices are affected by certain accessories, so make sure to remove them first.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.autoFixCe: Automatically Setup Collection and SB Guide Menus
Automatically updates certain types of text in the Item Collection and SkyBlock Guide menus, so they are 100% and 0% unlocked respectively.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removeDun: When enabled, dungeon stats in dark gray text will be removed from item lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removeTex: Remove Text Below Item Rarities (Copying Items)
When enabled and copying individual items, text below item rarities will be removed from lore.
Remove Text Below Item Rarities (Copying Inventories)
When enabled and copying inventories, text below item rarities will be removed from lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removeCli: When enabled, specific text lines that reference the act of clicking will be stripped from lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removeSho: When enabled, text that mentions the prices and requirements of purchasing items will be removed from lore.
When enabled, text that mentions the remaining stock of purchasable items will be removed from lore.
When enabled, text that mentions clicking to purchase items will be removed from lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removePic: When enabled, pickaxe abilities will be removed from lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.removePet: When enabled, pet items will be removed from lore.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.autoOpenS: When enabled, when you copy an item template, recipe template, or recipe tree template, the edit link sent in chat will automatically be opened in your browser.
yacl3.config.wikiwriter:config.skipConfi: When enabled, auto-opening links will bypass the confirm screen.
